brief_title: Documented Candida or Aspergillus Infections in Pediatric Patients (0991-043)
brief_summary: This study is an open label, noncomparative study using an investigational agent for the treatment of documented Candida or Aspergillus infections in pediatric patients (ages 3 months-17 years).
criteria: - Children, 3 months through 17 years of age, - with esophageal candidiasis or - invasive candidiasis or - children requiring salvage treatment of invasive aspergillosis.
